name: Dead Taste
description:
Discover the historical city of Michelstadt from its most alien-threatened side!

Collect and use all coats of arms to defeat the dumb invaders. You also have to find and keep the remaining Bembels to get full health.

And don not forget to visit the checkpoints of the city tour to learn about the history of all sights (sorry, German only).

Basic controls:

  • W/A/S/D - move
  • Left shift - sprint
  • Spacebar - jump
  • Left mouse button - throw
  • R - change player/enemies avatar
  • M - bird's eye view
  • N - reset player
  • U - toggle music on/off
  • Esc - quit game
